Note: Before sharing, hide any sensitive information, e.g. payment card or bank account numbers. | 2025-02-07 09:21:55 +0000 Agent: An advisor is available. Would you like to chat now? | 2025-02-07 09:22:52 +0000 Consumer: I updated my email to receive spotify data but it showed ‚ùùfor your protection we are unable to process your request at the moment‚ùù | 2025-02-07 09:22:53 +0000 Agent: We appreciate your feedback! They can see these messages and will review your query. | 2025-02-07 09:22:56 +0000 Agent: Randa I. is now connected and reviewing your question. They‚Äôll message you shortly. | 2025-02-07 09:23:15 +0000 Agent: Hi there! Thanks for reaching out to us. I‚Äôm Randa and will be happy to assist you. üòä | 2025-02-07 09:23:39 +0000 Consumer: hi | 2025-02-07 09:24:52 +0000 Agent: No worries, I'll help you, in order to access your account, I need to verify you're the account owner, can you send me one of these: ‚Ä¢ A screenshot of the oldest Spotify payment receipt you have. You can find this by searching your inbox for "Spotify receipt" ‚Ä¢ A screenshot of a Spotify payment on your bank or PayPal statement. Note: Make sure the screenshot doesn‚Äôt show your full credit card number or 3-digit code ‚Ä¢ Merchant reference number of your Spotify payment. It's a 10-digit reference number starting with "P" (e.g. P*********). | 2025-02-07 09:25:49 +0000 Consumer: what is merchant reference number? | 2025-02-07 09:26:01 +0000 Agent: It's a 10-digit reference number starting with "P" (e.g. P*********). | 2025-02-07 09:26:12 +0000 Consumer: where can I see it? | 2025-02-07 09:27:26 +0000 Agent: You can find this on your bank/credit card statement. | 2025-02-07 09:29:18 +0000 Agent: Thanks. | 2025-02-07 09:30:27 +0000 Agent: Unfortunately, this doesn't have enough information, can you check your email for a receipt please. | 2025-02-07 09:33:19 +0000 Agent: Thank you, I can change the email for you, can you send me an email not linked to Spotify? | 2025-02-07 09:34:27 +0000 Consumer: giangvtp09.sic@gmail.com | 2025-02-07 09:34:29 +0000 Consumer: thank you | 2025-02-07 09:35:33 +0000 Agent: Of course! I can see some suspicious activities on your account, would you like me to also log out all devices and reset the password? | 2025-02-07 09:35:51 +0000 Consumer: actually not | 2025-02-07 09:35:53 +0000 Consumer: thank you | 2025-02-07 09:36:30 +0000 Agent: I understand, I've changed the email, can you try to log in? | 2025-02-07 09:37:12 +0000 Agent: Tell me how it goes. | 2025-02-07 09:37:52 +0000 Consumer: yeah it works | 2025-02-07 09:37:56 +0000 Consumer: thank u very much | 2025-02-07 09:37:59 +0000 Agent: I'm very glad I was able to help you today, thanks for your kind cooperation üíö üòä Have a great day full of music üåûüé∂ | 2025-02-07 09:38:03 +0000 Agent: Question 1 out of 4 Tell us what you think!
